mpl_exclude_fig_titles.description: If :code:`True` maplotlib figures will not include the title.

mpl_transparent_background.description: If :code:`True` maplotlib figures will have transparent background (when applicable).

mpl_fig_formats.description: List of formats in which matplotlib figures will be saved. E.g. :code:`['svg']`

save_fit_results.description: If True, save the results of fits in the Analysis sub-folder
